mapper.select:
select M.ID_ ID, M.NAME_ name, M.VERSION_ VERSION, M.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ DEPLOYMENTID from ACT_RE_MODEL M, ACT_RE_PROCDEF D, ACT_GE_BYTEARRAY B, BPM_PROCESS BP, BPM_CONF_BASE BC where M.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ = D.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ and M.EDITOR_SOURCE_VALUE_ID_ = B.ID_ and BC.PROCESS_DEFINITION_ID = D.ID_ and BP.CONF_BASE_ID = BC.ID and BP.CATEGORY_ID != '715045391351808'
and M.NAME_ like '%'||#{filter}||'%'
order by M.NAME_

select M.ID_ ID, M.NAME_ name, M.VERSION_ VERSION, M.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ DEPLOYMENTID, D.RESOURCE_NAME_ RESOURCENAME, D.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ DGRMRESOURCENAME, B.BYTES_ BYTES from ACT_RE_MODEL M, ACT_RE_PROCDEF D, ACT_GE_BYTEARRAY B, BPM_PROCESS BP, BPM_CONF_BASE BC where M.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ = D.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ and M.EDITOR_SOURCE_VALUE_ID_ = B.ID_ and BC.PROCESS_DEFINITION_ID = D.ID_ and BP.CONF_BASE_ID = BC.ID and BP.CATEGORY_ID != '715045391351808' and M.ID_ = #{id} order by M.NAME_
select bytes_ from ACT_GE_BYTEARRAY t where t.name_ = #{name} and t.deployment_id_ = #{deploymentId}
mapper.update: update ACT_GE_BYTEARRAY B set B.bytes_ = #{bytes} where B.id_ = #{id}
